password.changePasswordDescription:
Please create your new password. Start by entering your old password.
Your new password must contain at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number and a symbol.
password.changePasswordMessage: The password has been successfully reset. For security reasons, we have sent an e-mail for confirmation.

confirmation.text:
We will e-mail your PIN to your school office as soon as possible.
{{personalData}}{{schoolName}}{{address}}{{location}}{{country}}{{websiteHeader}}{{website}}{{phoneHeader}}{{phoneNumber}}{{emailHeader}}{{email}}

proceedWithPIN.text:
You have requested activation with the following information:
{{personalData}}{{schoolName}}{{address}}{{location}}{{country}}{{websiteHeader}}{{website}}{{phoneHeader}}{{phoneNumber}}{{emailHeader}}{{email}}
We will e-mail the school office as soon as possible and send your PIN there.

failure.text: After 5 failed attempts, the PIN will be locked for security reasons. In order to request a new PIN please contact customer service at:

form.title: Please provide your school's contact information:

first.text: You have more than 2,000 interactive exercises with more than 100,000 problems available.

Do you want to collect the tests? Once collected, no more test questions can be completed. 
It will take a few minutes to collect the results from the tests that have not yet been submitted.

Add classes and students in the class administration section.

teacher.activeResults: Average results across all active students

releaseResults.text: Are you sure you want to release the test results to your students?

playlist.importInfotext:
Select the exercises you would like to import. Deprecated  
exercises which cannot be imported are market with {{ icon }}.

assignment.emptyGroup: You need at least one student in your class to make an assignment.
assignment.outdatedExercises: Please remove the outdated exercises first.

repeat.title: Forbid retries
repeat.description: If retries are forbidden, the students are only allowed to hand in the test once. However, before handing in the test, students can stop and continue the test within the given assignment dates.

helptools.title: Deactivate tips and help
helptools.description: Students will solve the exercises without any helping information.

calculator.title: Allow calculator
calculator.description: The students will have access to an online calculator while working on the exercise series.

results.title: Deactivate results
results.description: If the results are deactivated, the students will not see their results after handing in the test. Students will not see their results in the activity and assignment list either.

sameValues.title: Same values for all students
sameValues.description: All students will receive identical exercises, using the same numbers when starting the exercise series (otherwise they will be assigned randomly).

test.description:
When a worksheet is used as a test students solve the problems in any order, but they will not be given any tips or support. Tests can only be worked on between the starting date and the due date. A student’s answers will only be checked once the test is handed in. Until that point, students can review their answers and change them if necessary (this does not apply to problems that involve multiple steps). 
You can also use the following options:
test.title: Test

startCode.title: Protect with start code:
startCode.description: If the test is protected with a start code, only authorized students (such as those in the classroom) can start the test. Therefore you need to give the students the code at the beginning of the test.

exercise.description:
When a worksheet is used for practice, the students solve one task after another in a pre-determined order. Students get immediate feedback after every submission. They always get a second try and can repeat the exercise series as often as they want (even after the due date). 
Furthermore you have the following options:
exercise.title: Practice

teacher.noBooksAllocatedHint: You do not have any classes that you can assign books to.
teacher.noCurrentGroupToDosSubInfo: You can assign exercises in the "books" section. Open one of the books that you have distributed and select the exercises you want to assign. You can also create your own exercise series in the "Worksheets" section.
teacher.noCurrentStudentToDos: The selected student has no current assignments.
teacher.noExpiredGroupToDos: The selected class has no past assignments.
teacher.noStudentActivities: There is no activity for this student in the given time period.
teacher.noKnowledgeGaps: You do not have a class whose knowledge gaps can be displayed.
teacher.noScheduledGroupToDos: The selected class has no scheduled assignments.
teacher.purchase: You need a class licence to distribute books to your students. After purchasing a licence, you can assign any exercise series. Detailed, instant reports on all your students' work will then help you to target your teaching to meet their needs even more precisely. Contact our customer service team for more information about our prices.

activities.infoText: Number of completed exercise series by type in the selected time period.
activities.noData: No activity in the selected time period.

dashboard.loadingError: An Error occurred, please reload the page.

knowledgeGaps.infoText: "Total" shows all knowledge gaps open in the selected time period. "Closed" shows how many of those were closed in the same time period.
knowledgeGaps.noData: No knowledge gaps detected for the selected period.

ranking.infoText:
Students receive the following rewards for completing an exercise series, depending on their result:
- over 60 % - one coin (per attempt)
- over 75 % - two coins (per attempt)
- over 90 % - three coins (per attempt)
- 100 % - one star (once only)

Top tip: Collecting the coins and stars can be a great motivation for your students! For example, you can offer them rewards when they reach certain goals, or you can start a class competition.
ranking.noData: The selected class has no students yet.

dashboard.headline: General information on "{{groupName}}"

performanceReport.infoText: Here you can see each student's best results for their work in the books.
performanceReport.noReports: Here you can download the weekly summary of your classes' activities.{{break}}The first summary will be available within one week after the class was set up.
performanceReport.noContent: The activity report will be available from next week.

hotspotExercises.infoText: Based on all of the assignments due on the chosen date, this section shows the five exercises with the highest error rate. The percentage value gives the average of the best results of all participants.
hotspotExercises.noData: No exercises completed for the selected due date.

todos.infoText:
Here is an overview of all assignments due in the selected time period.

- Green: Assignments completed - score 60% or higher
- Red: Assignments completed - score under 60%
- Grey: Assignments incomplete
todos.noData: No exercises due by the selected date.

completedExercises.infoText:
Number of completed exercise series by type in the selected time period. Every series is counted only once, regardless of the number of attempts and repeats.


{{todoIcon}}: Completed assignments
{{bookIcon}}: Completed series in books
{{gapIcon}}: Completed knowledge gap series
completedExercises.noData: No exercises series completed for the selected period.

activityReport.infoText: Here you can see each student's best results for their book work. The overview is updated every week.
activityReport.noReports: Here you can download the weekly summary of your classes' activities.{{break}}The first summary will be available within one week after the class was set up.
activityReport.noContent: The activity report will be available from next week.

contactTeacherWithEmail.text:
Please contact your teacher to have your password reset. </br> 
You can also send an E-mail directly to your teacher.

Please ask your teacher to set up a new account for you.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
